thread.title_full: Punos Mobile’s Meeting Assistant® for Salesforce Launched Today, Introduces Real Time Field Sales Management

author: Hannu Alakangas
title: Punos Mobile’s Meeting Assistant® for Salesforce Launched Today, Introduces Real Time Field Sales Management
text:
Meeting Assistant® for Salesforce, the face-to-face sales app, today launched on Salesforce AppExchange. For the first time, information such as customers’ questions now flow in and out of face-to-face sales meetings, in real time. Using the app on any mobile device, field sales can now communicate the customers’ needs and views instantly to the CRM, and get answers to technical questions, even during their initial meeting with a customer. The sales representatives who use Meeting Assistant need no longer waste time typing their notes to a CRM after their meetings. Using the fully customizable meeting agendas, the salespeople can fully focus on the customer, not hide behind a laptop. With Meeting Assistant, the reps can send any information to the Salesforce CRM, and to the customer they just met, instantly.
Sales managers using Meeting Assistant lead, for the first time, their salespeople in real time, based on real quantifiable data, analytics and metrics. The manager can issue freely modifiable sales agendas, analyze how the reps perform, and offer remote sales training. Using Meeting Assistant, it is possible to fine-tune each and every individual sales pitch.
About Meeting Assistant® for Salesforce
Meeting Assistant for Salesforce is a multi-platform app for face-to-face sales meetings. The app streamlines the communication between the sales representatives, their back office, and the customers they meet. A multi-platform mobile app sold since 2014 on the App Store, Meeting Assistant helps the field sales and the management to communicate constantly and with minimum interference during ongoing sales meetings.
